accounts.name: SmartAccount
accounts.description: The main multisig smart account holding settings, signers, threshold, and time lock configuration

accounts.name: Proposal
accounts.description: A voting proposal attached to a transaction, tracks approvals/rejections from signers

accounts.name: Transaction
accounts.description: A transaction message to be executed by the smart account via CPI

accounts.name: TransactionBuffer
accounts.description: Buffer for uploading large transaction messages in chunks (max 4000 bytes)

accounts.name: Batch
accounts.description: Groups multiple transactions under a single proposal for sequential execution

accounts.name: SpendingLimit
accounts.description: Pre-approved spending limit allowing transfers without full multisig approval

accounts.name: ProgramConfig
accounts.description: Global program configuration (authority, treasury, creation fee)

accounts.name: Settings
accounts.description: Smart account settings including signers and permissions

accounts.name: SettingsTransaction
accounts.description: Transaction that modifies smart account settings when executed

accounts.name: Policy
accounts.description: Policy account defining constraints for program interactions, spending limits, and settings changes
